summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the TensorFlow implementation of the Wav2Vec2 robust speech model, covering configuration, forward pass signatures, hidden state outputs, input embeddings, training loops, inference (including batched and CTC loss scenarios), dataset conversion, token embedding resizing, and parity with the PyTorch version.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of the speech recognition model before deployment, ensuring it meets performance and compatibility standards for production use.
